facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population below international poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line increased from 0.7 % in 2003 to 2% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Italy has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was less than 2.5 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 8 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 4 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 5.6 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 3.4 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex and age (per 1,000 uninfected population)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , there were about 0.05 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 13.5 % in 2000 to 9.5% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 97.70196 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 11.1111 % in 2000 to 30.9524% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 93.67868 % of the population used a "safely managed" drinking water service - an improved source located on premises, available when needed and free from contamination

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 95.42635 % of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation service - a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity was 100.00 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , more than 95 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 13.22601 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 6.93399 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita declined from 3.50 % in 2000 to 1.69% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.21 kilograms in 2000 to 0.16 kilograms in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 1.29 % of GDP , up from 1.01 % in 2000

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 100.00 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Labour share of GDP, comprising wages and social protection transfers (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 52.5 % of GDP was from labour, comprising wages and social protection transfers

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 15.2833557128906 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Italy has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 13.22601 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 6.93399 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Italy has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2018 , 5.52869 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest increased from 28.45244 % in 2000 to 31.6074% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 84.69028 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 77.8509 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , the intentional homicide rate was 0.79 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2014 , there were about 100 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the inflow of personal remittances was 0.51 % of GDP , up from 0.43 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 27.94 % of the population , up from 0.2% of the population in 2000 .

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with national statistical plans that are fully funded (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2018 , Italy has developed national statistical plans that are fully funded.
